specifications.Finish: Decoration > Embroidery Embroidery is a decorative finishing that uses different stitches, yarns, and materials to create patterns on the fabric. This process adds visual interest, texture, and a handcrafted feel. Decoration > Sequin Sequin fabric is a stylish material covered with flat plastic or metal embellishments that come in various sizes, shapes, and colors. It creates a sparkling, eye-catching effect and is commonly used for partywear, evening gowns, and stage costumes.
specifications.Care Instructions: Hand wash only Wash separately Turn inside out before washing, Do not wring, Do not rub Do not bleach Flat dry Do not tumble dry Do not iron Recommended Use Bridal, Dresses
